content:
You ask the Guardian for tips or advice on the journey ahead. The Guardian advises you to always trust your intuition and to be open to learning and growth. The Guardian also reminds you that the journey will be difficult, but that the reward will be worth it in the end. The Guardian also reminds you that you will be given the aid of allies and enemies, each with their own unique abilities and stories, and that you will learn about the interconnectedness of all things and the role that you play in the grand scheme of the universe.

What would you like to do?

A) Accept the task and begin your journey
B) Refuse the task and go back to your normal life
C) Ask the Guardian for any other advice

Please pick one of the options above (A,B,C) to continue.
